articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: EU resists Trump: Tech regulation is our ‘sovereign’ right - politico.eu
articles.description: U.S. president launches attack on Europe’s digital rules, drawing opposition from Brussels.
articles.content:
The bombshell missive landed just days after Trump and Brussels issued a statement to formalize their tariff truce, provisionally established at Turnberry in Scotland in late July.
